title: season rewards
body: i  just got up to gold last season and i recieved my rewards but then i got a suspension out of nowhere when i hadn't been playing for like one month and now when i logged in again after my suspension everything was gone, my garves skin, my honor level, my gold frame. Does anything of this has to do with my suspension or is it a bug?

replies.body: I went ahead and checked up on this for you, and it does look like this was probably done from some kind of ranked behavior punishment. I'd be sure to check back on the response in your ticket to be 100% sure of what happened and why!

mhm I got that too last month because they accused me off mmr boosting, I contacted multiple supports about it and they just all copy and paste the same thing cause their automated bots says I'm boosted so that's what they believe. it honestly makes me upset because I Improved in the game and now since I'm doing better than before and learn from my mistakes up that means someone boosted me wow.

If you check out [this thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk), you'll see a list detailing ranked rewards. Is it possible that your suspension was related to boosting during the 2017 season? That's one way to disqualify you from the rewards. If that wasn't the case, or if you want to dispute it, you should submit a ticket and get more details about it.
thanks for your help. I just submited a ticket for more information.
